title: Amendments
description:
This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN:
B00W1X95S2
Three scars, two envelopes, one life. Using an amendment to change the past might mean risking your future. Would you be willing to take that chance? At twenty-one Emelia’s life is already marred by amendments. With her father gone, her mother broke the fundamental rule of amending and Emelia’s sister has been paying the price ever since. Now Emelia has her own two envelopes to use however she chooses. If only life were that straight forward.
author: Hannah M. Lynn
